title: Validate DLP Block+ RBI Isolate policy with custom device classification rule in source criteria of the DLP policy and test on managed device
custom_steps:
1. Create a custom device classification rule in the tenant admin UI under Settings-->Manage-->New device classification rule
 2. Create RBI Isolate policy
 3. Create DLP Block/Alert policy with with custom device classification rule in source criteria 
 4. Login to box app and upload a file that matches the DLP profile in the policy
 5. Verify X-NS-FLOW-DATA header"
custom_expected: The upload/download should be blocked for the laptop/device for which rule is created
